metadata.value: Industrial Machine DITA Demo - Motor Assembly Installation

Substep.Description: WARNING: war_step_01 (point the camera to the FRAME_PWD_21a_rep)
Substep.Comment: WARNING: Ensure that power is disconnected before proceeding.

Substep.Description: Install the Power Cable and Clips
Send note: not_step_07 (point the camera to the ENCLOSURE_PSM_176)
Substep.Comment: Note: Ensure that power is connected before proceeding.

Action.Comment: WARNING: Ensure that power is disconnected before proceeding.

Item.Comment: Install Bolts and Washers on Motor Mounting Plate.
Item.Text: Install Bolts and Washers on Motor Mounting Plate.
Attach Motor Mounting Plate on Workbench.

Install Motor Mounting Plate.

Ensure that power is disconnected before proceeding.

Item.Comment: Install Power Cord and Cable Clamps on Motor Mounting Plate.
Item.Text: Install Power Cord and Cable Clamps on Motor Mounting Plate.
Secure with Sheetmetal Screws.
Install Power Cord
Install Clutch Drive Assy and Bolts.
Attach Main Drive Motor.
Install Bolts, Washers and Nuts.

Item.Comment: Tighten the bolts, using a Wrench to secure the Nuts.
Item.Text: Tighten the bolts, using a Wrench to secure the Nuts.

Item.Comment: Tighten the Bolts to prevent movement during operation.
Item.Text: Tighten the Bolts to prevent movement during operation.

Item.Comment: Connect Power Cord to Main Drive Motor.
Item.Text: Connect Power Cord to Main Drive Motor.
Install Main Drive Motor.
Install Guard Bracket and Sheetmetal Screws.
Install Pully Cover.

Item.Comment: Install Key and Drive Pulley on Drive Motor Shaft.
Item.Text: Install Key and Drive Pulley on Drive Motor Shaft.

Item.Comment: Install Key and Slave Pulley on Clutch Shaft.
Item.Text: Install Key and Slave Pulley on Clutch Shaft.
Install Belt on Pulleys.
Install Drive Pulley.
Attach Left Guard.
Install Bolts.
Install Left Guard.

Action.Comment: Note: Ensure that power is connected before proceeding.

Item.Comment: Turn on Workbench using the Control Panel.
Item.Text: Turn on Workbench using the Control Panel.

Item.Comment: Ensure that movement is smooth in all both directions.
Item.Text: Ensure that movement is smooth in all both directions.

Item.Comment: Turn off Workbench using the Control Panel.
Item.Text: Turn off Workbench using the Control Panel.

Test Operation

Ensure that power is connected before proceeding.

SimulationInteractivity.DocumentTemplate:
Industrial Machine DITA Demo - Motor Assembly Installation

  1. Install Motor Mounting Plate.
    WARNING: Ensure that power is disconnected before proceeding.
    1. Install Bolts and Washers on Motor Mounting Plate.
    2. Attach Motor Mounting Plate on Workbench.

  2. Install Power Cord
    1. Install Power Cord and Cable Clamps on Motor Mounting Plate.
    2. Secure with Sheetmetal Screws.

  3. Install Clutch Drive Assy and Bolts.

  4. Install Main Drive Motor.
    1. Attach Main Drive Motor.
    2. Install Bolts, Washers and Nuts.
    3. Tighten the bolts, using a Wrench to secure the Nuts.
    4. Tighten the Bolts to prevent movement during operation.
    5. Connect Power Cord to Main Drive Motor.
  5. Install Drive Pulley.
    1. Install Guard Bracket and Sheetmetal Screws.
    2. Install Pully Cover.
    3. Install Key and Drive Pulley on Drive Motor Shaft.
    4. Install Key and Slave Pulley on Clutch Shaft.
    5. Install Belt on Pulleys.

  6. Install Left Guard.
    1. Attach Left Guard.
    2. Install Bolts.

  7. Test Operation
    Note: Ensure that power is connected before proceeding.
    1. Turn on Workbench using the Control Panel.
    2. Ensure that movement is smooth in all both directions.
    3. Turn off Workbench using the Control Panel.
